title: Instantapi â€“ Instant API for development
author: shjt
content: readme.md instantapi.js ( in action)usagestart server npm startrequest$.("http://localhost:3210/" + encodeuricomponent(json.stringify( { users: { firstname: "@str(10, 20)", lastname: "@str(10, 20)", age: "@num(0, 100)", "@repeat": 5 } } ))) response{ "users": [ { "firstname": "xsrktirhjd", "lastname": "sckmfvdgtxieoozhf", "age": 28 }, { "firstname": "rcpwguxktn", "lastname": "sbcefivvrpmbeulmu", "age": 89 }, { "firstname": "zoabougvgag", "lastname": "hrpbineget", "age": 90 }, { "firstname": "ccpblpszhsqoktve", "lastname": "hnwfzabkhpo", "age": 37 }, { "firstname": "tserpbcjhaagmxbgsp", "lastname": "zuwqlknpfyiysqnl", "age": 13 } ]}@num(min, max)returns integer between min (inclusive) max@str(min, max)returns string between min (inclusive) max@word(count, maxwordlength = 8)returns string sentence- form count words where each word 't longer maxwordlength@repeatreturn array repeated objectrun servernpm startrun testsnpm test
